name: part_001
file: tmp_【#雪花ラミィ生誕ライブ】ゲストいっぱい！誕生日LIVE【雪花ラミィ⧸ホロライブ】 [hEkHj1WZekU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Lamy Yukihana performing the song 'START:DASH!!' from Love Live!.
Transition scene with visual effects and a dark screen.
Lamy Yukihana performing the song 'Blue Bird' from Naruto Shippuden.

subtitles.original: うぶげの... 夢が... 生まれ...
subtitles.english: A fledgling... dream... is born...

subtitles.original: 悲しみに閉ざされて 泣くだけの君じゃない
subtitles.english: You're not someone who just cries, shut in by sadness

subtitles.original: 熱い胸 きっと未来を 切り開くはずさ
subtitles.english: With your burning heart, you will surely carve out a future

subtitles.original: 喜びを受け止めて 君と僕 つながろう
subtitles.english: Accept the joy, let's connect, you and I

subtitles.original: 迷い道 あと少しで 抜け出したはずさ
subtitles.english: You must have escaped that maze-like path by now

subtitles.original: 喜びを受け止めて 君と僕 進むだろう
subtitles.english: Accept the joy, we will move forward together

subtitles.original: それは 夢の欠片 愛おしい欠片
subtitles.english: It's a fragment of a dream, a precious fragment

subtitles.original: 彼方へと 僕はだ...
subtitles.english: To the beyond, I am...

subtitles.original: Hey, Hey, Hey, START:DASH!!
subtitles.english: Hey, Hey, Hey, START:DASH!!

subtitles.original: Hey, Hey, Hey, START:DASH!!
subtitles.english: Hey, Hey, Hey, START:DASH!!

subtitles.original: 羽ばたいたら 戻らないと言って
subtitles.english: Say that if you spread your wings, you won't return

subtitles.original:
ブルーバード
作詞・作曲 水野良樹
subtitles.english:
Blue Bird
Lyrics & Composition: Yoshiki Mizuno

subtitles.original: 目指したのは 蒼い 蒼い あの空
subtitles.english: What you aimed for was that blue, blue sky

subtitles.original: 悲しみはまだ覚えられず 切なさは今掴みはじめた
subtitles.english: I still can't remember sadness, and I've just started to grasp pain

subtitles.original: あなたへと抱くこの感情も 今言葉に変わっていく
subtitles.english: Even these feelings I hold for you are now turning into words

subtitles.original: 未知なる世界の夢から目覚めて
subtitles.english: Waking up from a dream of an unknown world

subtitles.original: この羽を広げ 飛び立つ
subtitles.english: Spread these wings and take flight

subtitles.original: 羽ばたいたら 戻らないと言って
subtitles.english: Say that if you spread your wings, you won't return

subtitles.original: 目指したのは 白い 白い あの雲
subtitles.english: What you aimed for was those white, white clouds

subtitles.original: 突き抜けたら みつかると知って
subtitles.english: Knowing you'll find it if you break through

subtitles.original: 振り切るほど 蒼い 蒼い あの空
subtitles.english: Blue, blue, that sky, enough to break free

subtitles.original: 蒼い 蒼い あの空
subtitles.english: Blue, blue, that sky

subtitles.original: 蒼い 蒼い あの空
subtitles.english: Blue, blue, that sky

subtitles.original: 愛想尽きたような音で 錆びれた古い窓は壊れた
subtitles.english: With a sound like it's lost all affection, the rusty old window broke

subtitles.original: 見飽きたカゴは ほら捨てていく 振り返ることはもうない
subtitles.english: Look, I'm throwing away the cage I'm tired of seeing; there's no looking back anymore

subtitles.original: 高鳴る鼓動に 呼吸をあずけて
subtitles.english: Entrusting my breath to my throbbing heartbeat

subtitles.original: この窓を蹴って 飛び立つ
subtitles.english: Kick this window and take flight

subtitles.original: 駆け出したら 手にできると言って
subtitles.english: Say that if I start running, I can grasp it

subtitles.original: いざなうのは 遠い 遠い あの声
subtitles.english: What beckons is that far, far-off voice

subtitles.original: 眩しすぎた あなたの手も握って
subtitles.english: Holding your hand, which was far too dazzling

subtitles.original: 求めるほど 蒼い 蒼い あの空
subtitles.english: The more I seek it, the blue, blue sky

subtitles.original: 堕ちていくと わかっていた
subtitles.english: I knew I would fall

subtitles.original: それでも 光を追い続けていくよ
subtitles.english: Even so, I will keep chasing the light

subtitles.original: 羽ばたいたら 戻れないと言って
subtitles.english: Say that if you spread your wings, you won't return

subtitles.original: 探したのは 白い 白い あの雲
subtitles.english: What I searched for was those white, white clouds

subtitles.original: 突き抜けたら みつかると知って
subtitles.english: Knowing you'll find it if you break through

subtitles.original: 振り切るほど 蒼い 蒼い あの空
subtitles.english: Blue, blue, that sky, enough to break free

subtitles.original: 蒼い 蒼い あの空
subtitles.english: Blue, blue, that sky

subtitles.original: 蒼い 蒼い あの空
subtitles.english: Blue, blue, that sky
